name: evil_plan.txt
content:
Step 1: Train pigeons to deliver snacks.
Step 2: Build a potato-powered laptop.
Step 3: Take over the world (after lunch).

name: cat_poem.txt
content:
Oh furry tyrant of the house,
You nap, you scratch, you chase a mouse.
But when I work, you sit on keys,
My productivity, you freeze.
